Hi everyone, how can we market our HubSpot themes? I’m a beginner so finding it difficult to market it. Thanks.

hi guys, I want to create a way for a sales team to manually trigger a workflow for a contact but pass some conditions (some way for them to select few items from a list and this selected items will be used inside a workflow), what approach would you suggest for this case?
Workflows allows you to use any of the contact properties, if it's a contact based workflow

The idea is to create an easy way for a sales rep to manually add a contact to multiple lists and then perform custom actions. I imagine it as some kind of form with a list of courses(around 20) with checkboxes where a sales rep clicks on courses that are needed and submit a form and when submitted workflow kicks in and performs actions on selected courses. What do you think is the best way to create this?

I mean you can enroll based on list membership so I would just setup a couple of properties on the contact page where the sales reps can sent the list memberships, then use the value in the property to add the contact to a list, then just setup your enrollment triggers accordingly
thanks
of course
